string.text: Technician lacks certain radio-technical materials for this upgrade. They might be inside the cement factory. You have to find them and bring them to the technician.
Mod files are damaged, the game cannot be loaded! \ nWe recommend that you run CheckUpdates.exe to automatically fix problems or reinstall the mod.

As an experienced stalker, you know very well that today's ally may be tomorrow's enemy - and vice versa. When completing tasks, you try not to attract undue attention to yourself and, if possible, look for bloodless ways to achieve your goals.
You can now purchase a silencer for almost any weapon found in the Zone from Owl.
